      • translate

        public static final java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String s,
                                               java.lang.String p,
                                               java.lang.String q)
        Replace in the string from argument s all occurrences of characters in the argument p by the character on the same position in the argument q. If no character is on the position of q then this character is removed.

        Examples:

        translate(bcr,abc,ABa) returns Bar.

        translate("-abc-","ab-","BA") returns "BAc".

        Parameters:
        s - source string.
        p - string with characters to be replaced.
        q - string with characters which will be in the result.
        Returns:
        translated string.

        Returns:

      • execute

        public static final java.lang.Process execute(java.lang.String[] cmdArray,
                                              java.lang.String[] envVars,
                                              java.io.File actDir,
                                              java.io.PrintStream stdOut,
                                              java.io.PrintStream stdErr,
                                              java.io.InputStream stdIn,
                                              boolean waitFlag)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the specified command and arguments in a separate process with the specified environment and working directory. If there is a security manager, its checkExec method is called with the first component of the array cmdArray as its argument. This may result in a security exception. Given an array of strings cmdArray, representing the tokens of a command line, and an array of strings envVars, representing "environment" variable settings, this method creates a new process in which to execute the specified command. If envVars is null, the subprocess inherits the environment settings of the current process. The working directory of the new subprocess is specified by actDir. If actDir is null, the subprocess inherits the current working directory of the current process. If out is null the output stream is printed to System.out, otherwise it is written to given stream out. If err is null the output stream is printed to System.err, otherwise it is written to given stream err. If stdIn is null the input stream passed to program is empty, otherwise it is passed from the stream from the parameter. If waitFlag is true the current thread waits until the executed process has been terminated.
        Parameters:
        cmdArray - array containing the command to call and its arguments.
        envVars - array of strings, each element of which has environment variable settings in format name=value.
        actDir - the working directory of the subprocess, or null if the subprocess should inherit the working directory of the current process.
        stdOut - output stream for standard output stream or null.
        stdErr - output stream for standard error stream or null.
        stdIn - input stream with standard input data or null.
        waitFlag - if true the current thread waits until the executed process has been terminated.
        Returns:
        a Process object for managing the executed subprocess.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

      • execute

        public static final java.lang.Process execute(java.lang.String[] cmdarray)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes a separate process with arguments.
        Parameters:
        cmdarray - array of strings with command line arguments.
        Returns:
        a Process object for managing the executed subprocess.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.
